iti110:0.3: The Chapter on the Holy Offering of the Teaching
iti110:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti110:2.1: “Mendicants, suppose a mendicant has a sensual, malicious, or cruel thought while walking.
iti110:2.2: If that mendicant tolerates them and doesn’t give them up, get rid of them, eliminate them, and obliterate them, they should understand:
